thread.title: From Kardashians to NBA stars, all join hands to pray for Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: From Kardashians to NBA stars, all join hands to pray for Lamar Odom

title: From Kardashians to NBA stars, all join hands to pray for Lamar Odom
text: From Kardashians to NBA stars, all join hands to pray for Lamar Odom Thursday, 15 October 2015 (1 minute ago) *Washington D.C., Oct. 15 (ANI): The Kardashians, who are devastated by Lamar Odom 's hospitalization after the former basketball star was found unconscious in Nevada, are showing their full support.* Washington D.C., Oct. 15 (ANI): The Kardashians, who are devastated by Lamar Odom's hospitalization after the former basketball star was found unconscious in Nevada, are showing their full support. Rob Kardashian posted a picture with Lamar on Instagram , in which the duo is hugging in an episode of 'Keeping Up With the Kardashians,' captioning it "Praying nonstop for my Brother!!" E!Online reports. The mother Kardashian, Kris Jenner , posted a picture of the former NBA star in a Lakers jersey and captioned it with "Please pray for Lamar #ourfighter." Kendall Jenner also tweeted, saying "Please don't go." Surprisingly, Kim Kardashian 's former husband Kris Humphries, took to twitter and said "Everyone please pray for @RealLamarOdom to make it through this. Great player, even better person!" NBA stars also showed their full support on social media. Cleveland Cavaliers player LeBron James updated his status on Facebook tagging Odom and said "So many prayers sent up to you LO! I truly hope this isn't the last stop for you because you still have so much to give, not even to others but to yourself more importantly. Never know what someone is going through unless you're walking in their shoes. No judgement. Straight up homie!" Los Angeles Lakers player Kobe Bryant left a pre-season game early and rushed to the hospital to support and pray for his former teammate. Kourtney Kardashian and Kendall Jenner also arrived at Las Vegas Hospital to support Lamar. Earlier, Odom checked into Dennis Hof's Love Ranch and was found unconscious in his room by a member of the staff Tuesday after days of partying. (ANI)
